ax_client = AxClient()
with self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, 'No generation strategy'):
    ax_client.get_max_parallelism()
ax_client.create_experiment(parameters=[{'name': 'x', 'type': 'range',
    'bounds': [-5.0, 10.0]}, {'name': 'y', 'type': 'range', 'bounds': [0.0,
    15.0]}], minimize=True)
self.assertEqual(ax_client.get_max_parallelism(), [(5, 5), (-1, 3)])
self.assertEqual(run_trials_using_recommended_parallelism(ax_client,
    ax_client.get_max_parallelism(), 20), 0)
ax_client = AxClient()
ax_client.create_experiment(parameters=[{'name': 'x', 'type': 'range',
    'bounds': [-5.0, 10.0]}, {'name': 'y', 'type': 'range', 'bounds': [0.0,
    15.0]}], minimize=True)
with self.assertRaisesRegex(DataRequiredError, 'All trials for current model '
    ):
    run_trials_using_recommended_parallelism(ax_client, [(6, 6), (-1, 3)], 20)
